issue.title: [Release][C++] Windows source verification hardcodes Visual Studio version
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16321](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16321). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`verify-release-candidate.bat` currently hardcodes the CMake generator to "Visual Studio 16 2019". Ideally it should be able to use any Visual Studio version present on the system.
